pages.text: Silk Moths are small bugs that can be found in the Dark Forest biome and the $(l:hexalia:world_gen/enchanted_bayou)Enchanted Bayou$().$(br2)These mobs are attracted to light sources, such as lamps, and comes in four different colors, brown, black, pink and blue.
Silkworms can be obtained upon breaking a Cocoon block, which can be found in the Dark Forest biome and $(l:hexalia:world_gen/enchanted_bayou)Enchanted Bayou$().

pages.title: Silkworm Cocoon
pages.text: These cocoons can spawn in the on the side of Dark Oak and Cottonwood trees logs.
Silk Moths can be bottled in a Rustic Bottle if you right-click the entity with the item, this allows you to move Silk Moths around.
The Silk Fiber itself can be obtained from combining leaves with a Silkworm, or with a small chance to drop from Silk Moths.
You can also combine strings with a Silk Fiber in order to craft a Cobweb block.
Strings can be obtained from Silk Fiber by crushing it in a $(l:hexalia:items/mortar_and_pestle)Mortar and Pestle$()
